name: Novotel Brussels Airport

reviews.text: This was a good airport hotel - it's very close the airport, has a free shuttle, yet you cannot hear any of the airport noises while in your room. I don't ever remember staying at an airport hotel that was THAT quiet. I would have never guessed it was that close to the hotel. I usually wear ear plugs when I sleep at hotels but had no need to here. The furniture was very comfortable and the AC worked great even in November (I like my room cold). The room was rather large, especially for European standards. There is a separate bathtub and shower which I liked.
reviews.title: Good airport hotel - extremely quiet

reviews.text: My flight got in at 9am and they were able to give me a room when I arrived at 9:30 which was wonderful as I laid down and got 2 hours of sleep. I took the free shuttle to the airport which was maybe 5 minutes away. In the basement of the airport is a train station that takes you into Brussels in about 15 minutes so I was able to sight-see for a few hours before taking the train and shuttle back to the hotel. Shuttle runs every 30 minutes on weekend and every 20 minutes during week.
reviews.title: What you can expect, no more, no less.
Perfect hotel to StopOver after Atlantic Flight from U.S.A.
reviews.text: Breakfast the next morning was fine, nothing special and was included in my rate. The internet was about 15 Euro for 24 hours but there are 2 computers with printers in the lobby that are free to use with internet (with awesome 32"+ screens).
Perfect over night stay close to the airport. Easy access, cool rooms with all the amenities you need for one night.
reviews.title: Quiet place at airport

reviews.text: Stayed here on our way into Europe & out again a month later. Modern, clean, big rooms with nice bathrooms. Close to airport & can take an easy train into the city from there. Lovely sunny restaurant with great lunches & breakfast. Helpful staff...internet, etc. We always like using Novotel at airports...very nice accomodations.
reviews.title: Nice Airport Hotel

reviews.text: Company had a meeting here and so we had a team dinner, overnight accomodation and a meeting room with coffee break.
reviews.title: Just another airport hotel but good meeting rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: All the booking requirements were carried out in a very efficient manner (the Crowne Plaza down the road took a week just to respond to my email enquiry!!) and the meeting facilties were excellent. A nice touch was the freshly cooked pancakes during our coffee break.
reviews.title: convenient airport hotel, but pricey breakfast!

reviews.text: The airport shuttle bus was sitting at the stop when I arrived outside the terminal but I did note that the driver left 5 minutes before the timetable said he would. On the way back there was no wait - good service.
reviews.title: Cant go wrong if you are business traveller

likes.liked: — Room desings, beds, second floor bar, hamman

reviews.text: Being right next to the airport means aircraft noise but this was more noticeable in the meeting room than in the bedroom which was... well, like all Novotels ;-).
reviews.title: Bad news.

reviews.text: The thing I didn't like was the dinner buffet which had plenty of choice but nothing was marked up so it was meat or fish or pasta with stuff. Not much real flavour so basically it filled my stomach but did not satisfy my senses.
reviews.title: Looking a bit tired, but fine for a night

reviews.text: I am for Malaysia and i stayed in Novotel Brussels Airport for 2 weeks in December 2006. I had the best experience in my life.
reviews.title: Beautiful Experience

likes.disliked: — variety of food for breakfasts to change at least twice a week

reviews.text: A special thanks to Maud, the manager incharge, who did her very best to make my stay a very confortable one. She really when all out of her way, just to make all her guest have an excellent stay and she provided 1st class service.
reviews.title: OK airport hotel
A night in Brussels
reviews.text: All the hotel staff were just excellent. They always had a smile on their faces, which made my stay very homely. A special thanks too, to Sebastien (assistant chief) who was very professional and friendly. They all projected a very sincere, professional and warm personality.

description: The Novotel Brussels Airport hotel is located 30 min by train from the centre of Brussels. This 3 star hotel is the ideal base for a business trip to the Belgian capital or to the Heysel Exhibition Park. Connected by a free 24 hr shuttle to Brussels Airport, the hotel features 209 modern and comfortable rooms, plus 9 modular meeting rooms and a fitness centre. The bar and restaurant, open until midnight, boast views of the garden and swimming pool.
